类 Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player extends Object
This class represents a player, who has a wallet to store their Objectcoins, experience to store the amount of experience while doing actions, level to show what the current level of the player is, currFarmerType to show what type of farmer the player is currently, a list of tools that the player can use, and a list of farmerType that the player can upgrade to.

  • 构造器概要

    Player()
    Creates a Player object.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Player

      public Player()
      Creates a Player object. This constructor also initializes wallet, experience, level, and currFarmerType. It also initializes tools that the player can use and farmerType upgrades that the player can upgrade to.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getWallet

      public int getWallet()
      A method that returns the amount of coins in the wallet.
      返回:
      amount of coins in the wallet

    • getExperience

      public double getExperience()
      A method that returns the amount of experience of the player.
      返回:
      amount of experience of the player

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
      A method that returns the level of the player.
      返回:
      level of the player

    • getCurrFarmerType

      public int getCurrFarmerType()
      A method that returns the current farmer type of the player.
      返回:
      currFarmerType of the player

    • getTools

      public ArrayList<Tool> getTools()
      A method that returns the list of tools that the player can use.
      返回:
      list of tools that the player can use

    • getFarmerType

      public ArrayList<FarmerType> getFarmerType()
      A method that returns the list of farmer types that the player can upgrade to.
      返回:
      list of farmer types that the player can upgrade to

    • subtractCoins

      public boolean subtractCoins(int coins)
      This method checks if there is sufficient coins to be subtracted from the player, then subtracts an amount of coins from the player's wallet if coins are sufficient.
      参数:
      coins - amount of coins to be subtracted
      返回:
      true if there is sufficient coins in the wallet and false if otherwise

    • addCoins

      public void addCoins(int coins)
      This method adds an amount of coins to the player's wallet.
      参数:
      coins - amount of coins to be added

    • addExperiencePoints

      public void addExperiencePoints(double experience)
      This method adds an amount of experience to the player's experience.
      参数:
      experience - amount of experience to be added

    • updateLevel

      public void updateLevel()
      This method updates the player's level based on the player's amount of experience

    • registerFarmerType

      public boolean registerFarmerType()
      This method checks if the player has enough experience and coins to register into the next farmer type. If the player has enough, coins will be deducted and the player will be upgraded to the next tier.
      返回:
      true if player successfully registered for the next tier of farmer type and false if otherwise

      public String toString()
